parameters.yesno:
outcome variable, a factor with levels
n not spam,
y spam
parameters.bang: Occurrences of ‘!’, as percent of total number of characters
parameters.money: Occurrences of ‘money’, as percent of total number of words
parameters.n000:
Occurrences of the string ‘000’, as percent of total
number of words
parameters.dollar: Occurrences of ‘$’, as percent of total number of characters
parameters.crl.tot: total length of uninterrupted sequences of capitals
parameters.make: Occurrences of ‘make’, as % of total number of words

title: Spam E-mail Data
description:
Description
The data consist of 4601 email items, of which 1813 items were identified
as spam.  This is a subset of the full dataset, with six only of the
57 explanatory variables in the complete dataset.
